strapiPost.title: Jaw Dropped
strapiPost.content:
Expect the unexpected in Bentonville. Moosejaw, a subsidiary business of Walmart, will open a store in downtown Bentonville.

  • Background: The outdoor recreation apparel and gear company was founded in 1992 in Michigan and has 11 other physical stores, including two in Kansas, which are the closest ones to NWA.
  • Rumor has it that Moosejaw has acquired a space in the downtown market district for the outdoor gear store, which will be the first in Arkansas and is expected to open this fall.

You can find the full story HERE.
